main.name: Soladoye Daniel
main.bio: I'm a Front-End React Web Developer also skilled in Unit Testing and Serverless development. Currently targeting oppourtunities as a Front-end Web Developer. Skills: JavaScript | React | React-Native | Firebase | Jest | Sass | Scss | HTML | CSS
main.contactmessage: You want to get a website? Get in touch with me so we can discuss further

work.title: Front-End Web Developer
work.description: Developed website for Sticker & Label vendor based abroad. working together with a back-end developer and we both built company's e-commerce website from scratch.  Helping improve customers outreach and generate more revenue for the business

work.title: Engineering assistant
work.description: Worked closely with mechanical engineers on-site, in the day-to-day operations. Learned about mechanical components and functions

testimonials.text: Daniel is an amazing web developer & freelancer, We met online through Instagram. He got the job done perfectly and this shows he is outstanding in what he does. I reccommend him to you if you want to get a website done.
